views.markdown: Configure options from Settings.No Screenshots for this item.

v2.2-3 - few UI changes (overall cleaner look) - added option to animate the presentation of HUD - removed respring button (no need to respring/reboot to apply changes anymore) v2.1-8 - minor HUD duration optimisation v2.1-7 - text fixes - added Twitter button - minor fixes - added credits - added donation button - cleaned up a little - added respring button - fixed a bug that wouldn't apply changes - added instructions and troubleshoot instructions v2.0
- cleaner look
- added option to hide ringer/volume HUD completely
- removed custom settings and implemented a slider for more control over HUD duration
- Added quicker HUD duration options

- Cleaned settings, looks neater

- Added custom HUD duration options
